SEARCH
Package com.comp2042.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputEventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements InputEventListener
Manages the core game logic and coordinates interactions between the model (Board) and the view (GuiController). This class implements InputEventListener to respond to user actions and game events. It handles game state updates, brick locking, line clearing, and scoring.

      public DownData onDownEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the DOWN move event. Moves the brick down or performs a hard drop.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
